params._wallet: Address where all revenue gets deposited

addRole(address,bytes32).details: Add an account to the role. Restricted to admins.

params._account: Address of user being assigned role

addToken(address).details: Adds a token that needs approval before being accepted

canManageCampaigns(address).details: Checks if a user can manage a campaign. Called but not restricted to external campaign proxies

createCampaign(uint256).details: Deploys and tracks a new campagign

params._categoryId: ID of category campaign deployer specifies

params._active: Indicates if a category is active allowing for campaigns to be assigned to it

createFeaturePackage(uint256,uint256).details: Creates a feature package purchased by campaig owners to feature their campaigns

params._cost: Cost of purchasing this feature package
params._time: How long a campaign will be featured for

disableCampaignApproval(uint256).details: Disables an approved campaign. Restricted to campaign owners

featureCampaign(uint256,uint256,address).details: Purchases time for which the specified campaign will be featured.

params._token: Address of token used to purchase feature package

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params._newCategoryId: ID of the category being switched to

params._active: Indicates if a category is active allowing for campaigns to be assigned to it

modifyFeaturedPackage(uint256,uint256,ui.details: Modifies details about a feature package

params._cost: Cost of purchasing this feature package
params._time: How long a campaign will be featured for

pauseCampaign().details: Pauses the factory, halts all transactions in the factory

pauseCampaignFeatured(uint256).details: Pauses campaign feature time storing what's left for later use. Restricted to campaign owner or manager

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

receiveCampaignCommission(address,uint25.details: Retrieves campaign commission fees. Restricted to campaign owner.

params._amount: Amount transfered and collected by factory from campaign request finalization

removeRole(address,bytes32).details: Remove an account from the role. Restricted to admins.

params._account: Address of user whose role is being removed

removeToken(uint256,address).details: Removes a token from the list of accepted tokens and tokens in list

renounceAdmin().details: Remove oneself from the admin role.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

setCampaignTransactionConfig(string,uint.details: Set Factory controlled values dictating how campaign deployments should run

params._denominator: Fraction Fee percentage on request finalization in campaign per category `defaultCommission` will be utilized if value is `0`
params._numerator: Fraction Fee percentage on request finalization in campaign per category `defaultCommission` will be utilized if value is `0`

setDefaultCommission(uint256,uint256).details: Sets default commission on all request finalization

params._denominator: Fraction Fee percentage on request finalization
params._numerator: Fraction Fee percentage on request finalization

setFactoryConfig(address,address,address.details: Set Factory controlled values dictating how campaigns should run

params._campaignImplementation: Address of base contract to deploy minimal proxies to campaigns
params._campaignRewardsImplementation: Address of base contract to deploy minimal proxies to campaign rewards
params._wallet: Address where all revenue gets deposited

signUp().details: Keep track of user addresses. KYC purpose

toggleAcceptedToken(address,bool).details: Sets if a token is accepted or not provided it's in the list of token

params._state: Indicates if the token is approved or not

toggleCampaignActive(uint256,bool).details: Temporal campaign deactivation. Restricted to campaign managers or campaign managers from factory

params._active: Indicates if the campaign will be active or not.  Affects campaign listing and transactions

toggleCampaignApproval(uint256,bool).details: Approves or disapproves a campaign. Restricted to campaign managers from factory

params._approval: Indicates if the campaign will be approved or not. Affects campaign listing and transactions
Indicates if the user will be approved or not

unpauseCampaign().details: Unpauses the factory, transactions in the factory resumes per usual
